label: Monthly (month-to-date)
summary_md:
# PTD Today Monthly Intelligence Brief – January 2026 (Month-to-Date)

## 1) Top Themes  
- Offshore wind turbine capacity advancements  
- China’s leadership in offshore wind single-unit capacity  
- Deployment of Vestas 15 MW offshore wind turbines  

## 2) Top Stories  
- China continues to lead in single-unit capacity offshore wind turbines in 2025, with Vestas installing its 15 MW turbine at offshore wind farms (Source: offshorewind.biz)  

## 3) Sector Takeaways  

**Renewables**  
- Offshore wind technology is advancing, with notable growth in turbine capacity exemplified by Vestas’s 15 MW installations.  
- China maintains a dominant position in offshore wind turbine single-unit capacity, indicating ongoing investment and capacity expansion.

**Others (Grid, Oil & Gas, Data Centers & AI, Chips & Supply Chain, Critical Minerals)**  
- Not enough information in the headline.

## 4) Notable Companies/Regions Mentioned  
- Companies: Vestas  
- Regions: China
